constructor-arg.value: select sum(pmtgrp.amount) as total_payments from pmt_grouping as pmtgrp, pmt_history as pmthist where pmtgrp.internal_account_number = :INT_ACCOUNT and pmtgrp.payment_group = :PMT_GROUP and pmthist.pay_date > :START_TIME and pmtgrp.online_trans_id = pmthist.online_trans_id and pmthist.pay_status in ('posted','processing','queued')

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(ps.pay_amt)::text, '0') AS total_scheduled_amount FROM pmt_schedule ps JOIN pmt_grouping pg ON ps.online_trans_id = pg.online_trans_id WHERE ps.pay_status = 'scheduled' AND ps.user_id = :userId AND to_char(ps.pay_date, 'YYYYMMDD') <= :compareDate AND pg.internal_account_number = :internalAccountNumber
